attributes.comment:
As a parent in the process of International adoption, it would be increasingly
difficult in the future to financially afford to adopt, if fees continue to increase. We
are asking as a family who had to renew their I-600A twice because of the length
of waiting time to adopt from China to please evaluate the impact of a fee increase
to families who have a heart for adoption. More importantly, the impact to orphans
waiting for forever families if fees continue to increase, making it difficult for many
families to financially invest in such an important life-changing mission.

Please do not increase the fees for international/domestic adoptions.

Thank you!

Dorothy Arredondo

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Dorothy Arredondo
